content.description: Whale Fall is a Steak Dinner reminiscent slab climb on the west face of Ambergris IPA. Very good intro for the type of climb. Start Matched on the slanted crimp sidepull that is in the dead center of the face. Establish some feet and head straight up toward the mini moon-pie like just like but smaller than the one used for a stance on Steak Dinner.There aren’t a lot of holds but they are luckily set in just the right places for a good slab climb!
content.location: West face of Ambegris IPAStart Matched in the slanted sidepull dead center.(34.7129879, -98.6470734)

content.description: Heart Of Glass is a Johnny Dawes no-hands style slab climb on the east face of Ambergris IPA boulder.  Start with your feet on the bottom of the diagonal crack and get to stepping. The line is “get to the top” but for a step in the right direction, get to a stance at the top of the slanted crack and then step up vertically at 1 o clock to begin a few moves to top out.  Very fun into to Johnny Dawes style boulder walking.
content.location: East face of Ambergris IPA boulder. Heart of Glass starts on the right side at the base of a slanted crack seam.

content.description: Head Of Wood is a Johnny Dawes style no-hands slab climb on the eastern face of Ambergris IPA boulder. Start in the approximate middle of the boulder and head straight up high stepping as you go. Grading is silly most of the time and trying to grade No-Hands climbing is even sillier.The Mountain Project indexes don’t allow for how Johnny Dawes himself grades no-hands climbs so just have fun with it.
content.location: Start in the middle of the east face of Ambergris IPA boulder.

content.description: 10 Second Fart follows the crack line across the slab face of the west side of Ambergris IPA boulderzStand Start and get into a stance on the shelf. Work up and to the right following the crack to the middle of the boulder. Top Out when the holds allow! Fun and exposed feeling for a shorty.
content.location: North end of west face of Ambergris IPA(34.7129879, -98.6470734)

content.description: Ambergris IPA is a two sided slab boulder on the northern slope of Little Baldy and has 3 fun slab lines, one being a Johnny Dawes style too!
